msContents.summary: Two series of anonymous midrashic commentaries on the parts of the Pentateuch, which may have been written out by an adaptor, for use at the delivery of public discourses.

collation.p: Quires of mostly 8 leaves each. Catchwords on nearly every verso. Irregular.

scriptDesc.scriptNote: Ashkenazi (or Greek) square script of the 14th century.
